CO-OPERATIVE • ARE SOWING THE SEEDS OF COMMUNITY PROGRESS WE ARE PLANTING THE FIELDS OF OPPORTUNITY FOR the COMFORTS AND SECURITY' YOU DESIRE Wisconsin Co-Operative Week Feb. 20 to 25 ON THE OCCASION OF CELEBRATING A STATE WIDE jLO-OPERATIVE WEEK, FEBRUARY 20TH TO FEBRUARY 25TH, WE POINT WITH PRIDE TO THE INTEGRAL PART WE HAVE PLAYED IN SERVING THE NEEDS OF THIS COMMUNITY. WE ARE PROUD OF OUR PART IN DEVELOPING A TRUE SPIRIT OF CO-OPERATION - THE ENDEAVOR TO BENEFIT OURSELVES NOT AT THE EXPENSE OF OUR NEIGHBORS) BUT THROUGH THE HELPFUL COOPERATION OF OUR NEIGHBORS. THIS GROWTH OF CO-OPERATIVE ENTER PRISES IN EASTERN MONROE COUNTY HAS GIVEN YOU THE PULSE BEAT NECESSARY TO SUSTAIN LIVING STANDARDS HIGHER, BY FAR, THAN THEY OTHERWISE WOULD HAVE BEEN.
